title: Xbox Wireless Headset - Launch Trailer
author: Xbox
description:
Game loud and clear with the all-new Xbox Wireless Headset, featuring auto-mute and voice isolation for crystal-clear chat, intuitive design, and direct pairing to your console.

Learn more: https://www.xbox.com/accessories/headsets/xbox-wireless-headset

Subscribe to Xbox 🎮 https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

Follow Xbox in other channels:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Xbox  
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Xbox  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Xbox  

AUDIO DESCRIPTION: https://youtu.be/dMtkDZfGD0Q

localize.description:
使用全新的 Xbox Wireless Headset 大声且清晰地进行游戏，具有自动静音和语音隔离功能，可实现水晶般清晰的聊天，设计直观，并可直接与游戏机配对。

了解更多信息：https://www.xbox.com/accessories/headsets/xbox-wireless-headset

订阅Xbox 🎮 https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

localize.title: Xbox无线耳机--发布会预告

localize.description:
